member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT
member.summary: Defines the horizontal alignment options for content within a viewport.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT.DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT_NONE
member.summary: No alignment. The object can be positioned anywhere within the viewport.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT.DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT_LEFT
member.summary: Align object along the left side of the viewport.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT.DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT_CENTER
member.summary: Align object to the center of the viewport.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT.DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT_RIGHT
member.summary: Align object along the right side of the viewport.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT.DIRECTMANIPULATION_HORIZONTALALIGNMENT_UNLOCKCENTER
member.summary: Content zooms around the center point of the contacts, instead of being locked with the horizontal alignment.
